name: Last Cube Standing
description:
Top-Down Based Desktop Game Developed Using Unity Engine.

A Game Of A Cube Fighting The Ghosts That Assassinated Its Geometric Family And Conquered The Village. A Stressful Rough Battle To Death...

How Many Ghosts Can You Hunt?
